name: SkylinkNet
0:
”Alexa, ask SkylinkNet to arm away”
”Alexa, ask SkylinkNet to check the alarm status”
”Alexa, ask SkylinkNet to close the garage door”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sky link net
des:
SkylinkNet allows you to monitor your home with your smartphone. With the built-in alarm features, you can remotely arm, disarm, and monitor various activities with this app. 

Create a smarthome by adding home control modules to control lights, electrical appliances and other household devices. SkylinkNet also works with Atoms Garage Door Opener so you can open and close your garage door opener thru the smartphone app. 

To get started, install SkylinkNet app on your iOS or Android device. To use this skill click the “Enable Skill” button on the Alexa app and link it to your SkylinkNet account by signing in with your user name and password. For more information about connecting Smart Home devices, please visit http://amzn.to/291lR7u. 

You can control your SkylinkNet by saying:

“Alexa, ask SkylinkNet to arm away”
‘Alexa, ask SkylinkNet to check alarm status”

You can check sensors status by saying:
"Alexa, ask SkylinkNet to check sensor status"

You can also control multiple SkylinkNet systems by saying:

“Alexa, ask SkylinkNet to set Office to arm away”
“Alexa, ask SkylinkNet to check Home alarm status"

For more information about SkylinkNet and Alexa capabilities, please visit http://skylinkhome.com/works-with-alexa.

If you encounter any problems, please contact Skyilnk at http://skylinkhome.com/support.
